thread.title: Calling All Runners: Training for the Big Race
thread.title_full: Calling All Runners: Training for the Big Race

title: Calling All Runners: Training for the Big Race
text:
Calling All Runners: Training for the Big Race Where 
2660 Brickell Ave., 2nd Floor Miami, FL 33129 
7:00 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015 Categories 
Events, Outdoors | Recreation, Sports You've decided to run a marathon, half marathon or 5K. Now what? Join us for tips on how to: Fuel your body for training and race day, avoid common injuries, improve your form and learn strength training exercises, and train safely and effectively to achieve your personal best!
